data.message: How do you really delete or unfriend them? I have deleted them but if they don't do the same, they still can see everything on my page.

replies.message: You might need to look at your privacy settings and/or block them

Hey GloriaAnn. You can unfriend someone by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1qV0iqi and use the audience selector to change who can see stuff you share on your Timeline here: http://on.fb.me/1blgghu. You can also check out Privacy Basics, a new resource where you can get tips and a how-to guide for managing your information on Facebook. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/14oc4l2. -Jenny
Thank you. *I will copy that and try it. I am kind of computer challenged.
You can also block the person in question. That prevents them for seeing your profile and anything you post. You also won't be able to see their profile or anything they post.
Sarah Sarah HakunaMatata Juliano!! Did you do this ??
